A Brief Introduction to Neural Networks

This document provides a comprehensive overview of neural networks, written by David Kriesel, with the intention of making it accessible to a wide audience. The work was originally prepared for a seminar at the University of Bonn in Germany and has since been extended and published online. It includes illustrations and is written in an effort to make complex concepts memorable and easy to understand.
